text:
Meet Lokesh Mishra, Territory Manager (Lubricants) at BPCL, who's driving growth and innovation across key business segments. With a strong foundation in Electronics Engineering and over 15 years of experience, Lokesh has consistently delivered exceptional results.

He started his professional journey with BPCL in Retail in 2008. As a Territory Manager in Jabalpur in Madhya Pradesh, BPCL became the preferred fueler for petrol vehicle driving consumers, achieving three consecutive years of market share gains.

Lokesh's journey is a testament to the power of adaptability, performance and passion. Ready to write your own success story at BPCL? Explore career opportunities: https://t.co/xdI5nLDdgI

#HumansOfBPCL #CareerAtBPCL #Growth

We're proud to announce that BPCL has climbed the ladder in Business Today's latest edition of India's 500 Most Valuable Companies!

Key Highlights:

+ Improved overall ranking from 70 to 65
+ 7th place in Total Profit After Tax (PAT)
+ 4th place in Total Income
+ 15th place in Total Assets

Our consistent efforts have yielded significant growth and we remain committed to delivering value to our stakeholders.

BPCL proudly records the highest ever Ethanol blending of 14.4% in Q1 2024-25!

The milestone is a testament to India's remarkable achievement of reaching 15% ethanol-blended fuel as the standard in June 2024. This not only benefits the environment by significantly reducing emissions but also strengthens the agri-based economy by opening new investment opportunities and boosting farmers' incomes. 

@PetroleumMin 
#SustainableEnergy #EthanolBlending #BPCL

BPCL Achieves Unprecedented Milestones in Q3 FY 23-24! 

We are pleased to unveil exceptional physical performance for the current quarter, showcasing remarkable growth and expansion across key metrics:

+ Impressive Throughput Growth: 9.86 MMT in Q3 FY 24 & 29.57 MMT in April ‚Äì December 2023, underscoring our commitment to meeting growing energy demands.

+ Market Sales Momentum: 12.92 MMT in Q3 FY 24 compared to 12.81 MMT in the same quarter of FY 23, demonstrating company's resilience and responsiveness to market dynamics.

+ Ethanol Blending Success: An impressive average ethanol blending percentage of 11.53% during April ‚Äì December 2023, contributing to a sustainable and eco-friendly energy landscape.

+ Retail Network Expansion: Added 501 new Fuel Stations. The total network strength now stands at an impressive 21,532, ensuring enhanced accessibility and convenience for our valued customers.

+ CNG Station Milestone: In a significant contribution to clean energy, commissioned 112 new CNG stations during April to December 2023, bringing the total strength to an impressive 1,711 as of December 31, 2023.

BPCL continues to lead the way in shaping a sustainable and customer-centric energy future. Join us in celebrating our  outstanding achievements!

Unprecedented Success: BPCL Breaks Record with Highest Net Profit!

~ In a remarkable feat, we are pleased to announce the highest-ever Net Profit of Rs. 22,449.32 Crores for the nine months ending December 2023, marking a significant turnaround from the previous year.

~ Net Profit for Q3 surged to Rs. 3,397.27 Crores, showcasing substantial growth over Rs. 1,959.58 Crores profit in the corresponding quarter of FY 22-23.

This monumental achievement is a testament to BPCL's relentless dedication, strategic resilience, and commitment to excellence, which have propelled the company to new heights, reinforcing  its position as a key player in the ever-evolving energy landscape.
#Q3FY24 #Q3FY24Results #BPCL #profits
